short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple notebook which helps you to save/manage your notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features :
1.Lightning fast experience.
2. No login required.
3. Formatting options.
4. Recycle Bin.
5. Manage notes in categories
6. Automatically sync with chrome.
7. Reorder notes.

Future roadmap: 
1. Search capabilities.
2. Copy to clipboard.
3. Print notes.
4. Themes (dark/light mode).
5. Download notes.
6. Support for multiple language
